Providing Vermont and other states with the flexibility to build upon health care reform will result in better care and greater access at a lower cost. Allowing us to become a laboratory for innovation and excellence will help Vermonters, while once again allowing us to lead the way. Patrick Leahy said, "While some in Washington are trying to turn the clock back on health reform, Vermont instead is moving forward. is a net positive." Turning to the bigger picture, Eric Schmidt collects his thoughts for a moment. "I can only describe this now as a "wow" moment," he says. For me this is the beginning of the real revolution in information. "You need never be lonely, you need never be bored. It is a remarkable change that has not been led by and is not just for the Western elites- it is all-pervasive with a declining cost. "We are just at the beginning of hearing the voices who are starting to come online. I feel that we have made a material change in the lives of literally billions of people. The convergence of search, location and social is the next big narrative. was voted comeback player of the year. DALLAS- The NFL threw Michael Vick a party Saturday night as the Eagles quarterback was named comeback player of the year, capping off an improbable season. I thank my coaches and my teammates, said Michael Vick , who was on hand to accept his award. "They got me better as an NFL player, as a quarterback, and took advantage of my talents."
